column3: The SELECT command retrievesdata from a database.
The INSERT command adds newrecords to a table.
column4: INSERT INTO table_name(column1, column2) VALUES(value1, value2);

column3: The UPDATE command is usedto modify existing records in atable.
column4: UPDATE table_name SET column1= value1, column2 = value2WHERE condition;
column5: UPDATE employees SETemployee_name = ‘John Doe’,department = ‘Marketing’;

column3: The DELETE command removesrecords from a table.
column5: DELETE FROM employees WHEREemployee_name = ‘John Doe’;
